headline: Devon Energy Schedules Second-Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, June 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Devon Energy Corp. (NYSE: DVN) today announced it will report second-quarter 2025 results on Tuesday, August 5, after the close of U.S. financial markets. The earnings release and presentation for the second-quarter 2025 results will be available on the company’s website at www.devonenergy.com. On Wednesday, August 6, the company will hold a conference call at 10 a.m. CDT (11 a.m. EDT), which will consist primarily of answers to questions from ana

headline: This Cheap Energy Stock is on Track for a Significant Increase in Cash Flows
summary: Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) is one of the 12 Best Natural Gas Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) generated an impressive $1 billion in free cash flow in the first quarter of 2025, returning nearly half to shareholders through dividends and share buybacks.
